instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 820 4924 no trackpad at all and keyboard sort of
threads.message:
Have a Macbook Pro Retina been brought with a trackpad that does not work at all and keyboard that doesn't work... sort off.
If you try to switch it on normally from the power button  - that switches it off, but on the log on screen the trackpad does not work and neither does the keyboard, BUT
if you hold does the power button to switch it off then it switches off. So in the OS the keyboard does not work apart from the power button, but this is part of the keyboard anyway isn't it?
Trying to use the keyboard by trying to get it into target disk mode:
Switch on and hold T, does not work, it just loads into the O/S.
Haven't started checking voltages yet, am getting a flex cable for the trackpad and external keyboard and mouse both work OK, but does the power button somehow work independently to the rest of the keyboard?

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 820 4924 no trackpad at all and keyboard sort of
threads.message: the power button is independent of the rest of the keyboard, try an external keyboard and check for corrosion around the connectors and cable

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 820 4924 no trackpad at all and keyboard sort of
threads.message: Bad flex cable is the usual problem if it is not liquid damaged.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 820 4924 no trackpad at all and keyboard sort of
threads.message: No liquid damage no, I have flex for the track pad and new keyboard on the way so will be able to test more in a few days. In the mean time I will be checking connectors just in case.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 820 4924 no trackpad at all and keyboard sort of
threads.message: It is the flex, same shit as with the HDD cables on the A1278.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook pro 820 4924 no trackpad at all and keyboard sort of
threads.message:
Changed the flex and all is OK now.
Done
